channel.title: Npc animations 317

item.title: Npc animations 317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:5, topic:543377”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=662255.msg4426395#msg4426395 date=1401066704]
LMAOOOOOOOOO keep it looks bomb af

but in all seriousness change the walking animations in the client
[/quote]
Are you positive they’re client-sided?
I believe they maybe be in NPCHandler or another NPC class…
atleast in older wL sources they are.
And yes I know it can be done on both sides but which is easier and more efficient.[/quote]
The server-sided anims you set are usually attack/death emotes. Even those can/are done client sided as well, but are commonly done server sided.

Read full topic
